faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about Bitchanic

q1.question: What is Bitchanic?
q1.answer: Bitchanic is a decentralized ecommerce platform for sustainable hydroponic produce. It combines cryptocurrency payments with farm transparency and loyalty rewards.

q2.question: How do I purchase produce?
q2.answer: Connect your MetaMask wallet, browse products in our marketplace, add items to cart, and checkout with BCHN tokens. Each purchase earns you loyalty points.

q3.question: What are subscription plans?
q3.answer: We offer weekly, monthly, and quarterly delivery subscriptions. Choose your preference and enjoy fresh produce on a regular schedule with exclusive subscriber benefits.

q4.question: How does the loyalty program work?
q4.answer: Earn 1 loyalty point for every BCHN spent. Redeem points for BCHN tokens or unlock tier benefits like discounts and exclusive access to premium produce.

q5.question: What blockchain is this on?
q5.answer: Bitchanic is built on Ethereum and Polygon for low fees and fast transactions. Our smart contract is audited and fully transparent.
